channel.title: Almost got fooled
channel.description:
Yea so the other day i got an email saying my RS account was banned for RWT and i thought thats weird i havent been on it for a while. Today i got another saying "Confirm Email Address change" So i clicked the link and canceled it. But then i noticed the address was not a secure address, website for Email address change http://secure.runiescapee.com/m=email-register/loginform.php?ssl=216&login=1039238995 And for the Ban: http://appeal.runescaye.com/loginform.php?mod=www&ssl=4&&dest=title.ws [size=14pt][b]DO NOT ENTER YOUR EMAIL/LOGIN AS THESE ARE FAKE.[/b][/size] The Email to me were done very professionally and i didnt suspect them until i saw the website URL. Emails:
Dear Player This is an automated email from Jagex Ltd., makers of RuneScape and FunOrb, and publishers of War of Legends, in response to a request to change the registered address for your Jagex account. To confirm you want to change your address, we require you to follow this link: https://secure.runescape.com/m=email-register/enter_code.ws and fill in the email address this message was sent to and the verification code shown below. Your verification code: 51PHGHV8RVNSgZKePKDgl4ZFFYGHXm Your verification code will expire at 02-Apr-2011 14:53. To complete the address change, you will need to enter the validation code from a message that will be sent to your new email address. IF YOU DID NOT REQUEST ANY CHANGES: You can enter your abort code at the code entry page: https://secure.runescape.com/m=email-register/enter_code.ws If you do not abort this change, your registered address WILL change at 03-Apr-2011 14:53 if the validation code is submitted by the owner of the new address. Your abort code: w5nmrtUxChQzbldjic6uxi1xsIkGOg You should also make sure your account is secure by setting a new password and recovery questions. We also recommend you make sure your computer is secure by installing up-to-date antivirus software. We store no information about you other than your email address, and we will never pass this on to other companies without your consent. Many thanks, Jagex Games Studio Jagex Ltd. St. John's Innovation Centre Cowley Road Cambridge CB4 0WS United Kingdom Copyright © 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape, FunOrb, War of Legends and Stellar Dawn are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd in the United Kingdom and trademarks used in other countries of the world. By using our service you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
Dear RuneScape Player, This is an automated email from Jagex Ltd., makers of RuneScape and FunOrb, and publishers of War of Legends. We regret to inform you that your RuneScape account has been permanently banned for Real World Trading. This offence is permanent and will remain on your account until an appeal is received and reviewed. Real World Trading is a serious offence and as a result you have been given a serious punishment. If you wish to see more information and/or send in an appeal, you may do so at the link given below. Note: Due to a bug in the system, you may have received this infraction due to our own technical issues. If this is the case, the offence may have been removed. Please log in to the RuneScape website below: http://appeal.runescape.com/loginform.ws?mod=www&ssl=4&dest=title.ws Thanks for reading, Jagex Ltd. Copyright © 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape, FunOrb, War of Legends and Stellar Dawn are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd in the United Kingdom and trademarks used in other countries of the world. By using our service you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.
[b]If anyone knows how to report it to Jagex let me know cause i cant find a "Report false site" button on there homepage.[/b]

item.title: Almost got fooled
item.dc:creator: @bloodrayne bloodrayne
item.description:
@bloodrayne wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:7, topic:387625”][quote author=Miss Silabsoft link=topic=483421.msg3541255#msg3541255 date=1300881441]
how hard is it to read the messages all over jagex products you know the ones that say “JAGEX WILL NEVER CONTACT YOU VIA EMAIL OR INGAME ABOUT ACCOUNT RELATED INFOMRATION, JAGEX WILL ONLY USE THE MESSAGE SYSTEM”? They put a lot of time and effort in those messages and people still can’t figure it out.
[/quote]
Pretty sure they do contact you by email though when you first associate and email address with an account, and when you change the email address associated with an account.[/quote]

This. Ever since their change to registering emails an what not, they do contact you via email now. Mostly for email based settings, they wont email you if you receive a ban or something.

I’ve gotten these also, but opendns does a very good job of completely blocking them if Google Chrome doesn’t give me a warning first.

Read full topic

item.title: Almost got fooled
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Miss Silabsoft:

how hard is it to read the messages all over jagex products you know the ones that say “JAGEX WILL NEVER CONTACT YOU VIA EMAIL OR INGAME ABOUT ACCOUNT RELATED INFOMRATION, JAGEX WILL ONLY USE THE MESSAGE SYSTEM”? They put a lot of time and effort in those messages and people still can’t figure it out.

Pretty sure they do contact you by email though when you first associate an email address with an account, and when you change the email address associated with an account.

Read full topic

item.title: Almost got fooled
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

Yea so the other day i got an email saying my RS account was banned for RWT and i thought thats weird i havent been on it for a while.

Today i got another saying “Confirm Email Address change”

So i clicked the link and canceled it. But then i noticed the address was not a secure address,

website for Email address change

http://secure.runiescapee.com/m=email-register/loginform.php?ssl=216&login=1039238995

And for the Ban:

http://appeal.runescaye.com/loginform.php?mod=www&ssl=4&&dest=title.ws

[size=14pt]DO NOT ENTER YOUR EMAIL/LOGIN AS THESE ARE FAKE.[/size]

The Email to me were done very professionally and i didnt suspect them until i saw the website URL.

Emails:

Dear Player

This is an automated email from Jagex Ltd., makers of RuneScape and FunOrb, and publishers of War of Legends, in response to a request to change the registered address for your Jagex account.

To confirm you want to change your address, we require you to follow this link: https://secure.runescape.com/m=email-register/enter_code.ws and fill in the email address this message was sent to and the verification code shown below.

Your verification code: 51PHGHV8RVNSgZKePKDgl4ZFFYGHXm

Your verification code will expire at 02-Apr-2011 14:53. To complete the address change, you will need to enter the validation code from a message that will be sent to your new email address.

IF YOU DID NOT REQUEST ANY CHANGES:
You can enter your abort code at the code entry page: https://secure.runescape.com/m=email-register/enter_code.ws
If you do not abort this change, your registered address WILL change at 03-Apr-2011 14:53 if the validation code is submitted by the owner of the new address.

Your abort code: w5nmrtUxChQzbldjic6uxi1xsIkGOg

You should also make sure your account is secure by setting a new password and recovery questions. We also recommend you make sure your computer is secure by installing up-to-date antivirus software.

We store no information about you other than your email address, and we will never pass this on to other companies without your consent.

Many thanks,

Jagex Games Studio

Jagex Ltd.
St. John’s Innovation Centre
Cowley Road
Cambridge
CB4 0WS
United Kingdom

Copyright © 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape, FunOrb, War of Legends and Stellar Dawn are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd in the United Kingdom and trademarks used in other countries of the world.
By using our service you are agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

Dear RuneScape Player,

This is an automated email from Jagex Ltd., makers of RuneScape and FunOrb, and publishers of War of Legends.

We regret to inform you that your RuneScape account has been permanently banned for Real World Trading. This offence is permanent and will remain on your account until an appeal is received and reviewed.

Real World Trading is a serious offence and as a result you have been given a serious punishment. If you wish to see more information and/or send in an appeal, you may do so at the link given below.

Note: Due to a bug in the system, you may have received this infraction due to our own technical issues. If this is the case, the offence may have been removed. Please log in to the RuneScape website below:

http://appeal.runescape.com/loginform.ws?mod=www&ssl=4&dest=title.ws

Thanks for reading,

Jagex Ltd.

Copyright © 1999 - 2011 Jagex Ltd. Jagex, RuneScape, FunOrb, War of Legends
and Stellar Dawn are registered trademarks of Jagex Ltd in the United Kingdom and
trademarks used in other countries of the world. By using our service you are
agreeing to our Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy.

If anyone knows how to report it to Jagex let me know cause i cant find a “Report false site” button on there homepage.
